name: TONKIT
description: The TON Toolkit (TONT) contains everything you need to build, manage, and launch your project on the TON blockchain, including state of the art tools for managing your project once deployed. Launchpad and Manager Effortlessly launch your project out of several templates, customize them, and manage the project through the kit. Scooping Feature Use premium features to scoop up tokens to reserved addresses by bundling instructions when you deploy your project. Cross-chain bridging Bridge deployed projects from the Ethereum Network to TON with low transaction costs and low fees.
